articles.description: India has reported four cases of monkeypox, including three in Kerala, so far. Meanwhile, the west Delhi man, who was the first reported monkeypox case in the capital, is currently recovering in the isolation ward of the Lok Nayak Jai Prakash (LNJP) Hospital.…
articles.content:
